features: REFRESHES SKIN: Dove Cool Moisture Beauty Bar combines the refreshing scents of cucumber and green tea with Dove mild cleansers for skin care to revitalize both your senses and your skin
DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Dove Beauty Bar is the dermatologist-recommended Beauty Bar in the U.S
MILD & MOISTURIZING: With ¼ moisturizing cream, Dove Beauty Bar helps your skin maintain its natural moisture barrier and keeps skin hydrated as part of your skin care routine
VERSATILE CLEANSER: The unique formulation for effective skin care can be enjoyed by the entire family as this all-in-one cleanser nourishes your face, body, and hands for beautiful skin
EFFECTIVE CLEANSING: Wash away dirt and germs, without drying your skin like ordinary bath soap can. This beauty bar is gentle enough to use every day on your body and your face
THOUGHTFULLY MADE SKIN CARE: This Beauty Bar is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and sulfate free cleansers, so you can feel good about switching from ordinary bar soap to Dove
body.description: Dove Cool Moisture Beauty Bar combines the refreshing scent of cucumber and green tea with Dove gentle cleansers and ¼ moisturizing cream. Dove Beauty Bar is proven to be more gentle and mild on skin than ordinary bar soap. It can be used as a hand soap and as a mild facial cleanser, so if you’re also after a fresh face and refreshed hands throughout the day, why not try adding Dove Cool Moisture Beauty Bar to your skin care routine. A light, hydrating feel and refreshing formula for effectively nourished skin. A refreshing shower can be just what you need to start the day off right. Dove blends nourishing ingredients and light, fresh scents in a formula that’s gentle on your skin whether it is used as a bar of soap, facial cleanser, body wash or hand soap. Dove Beauty Bars give you a feeling of hydrating freshness that leaves you and your skin feeling blissfully revived, unlike when using harsh bar soap. It's the same great formula with a new look. For best results: Give your hands the boost they deserve with Dove Beauty Bar between wet hands. Once you’ve covered your body with the rich lather, make sure to avoid contact with your eyes, and rinse away thoroughly. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem and realize their full potential.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Go Fresh Cool Moisture Beauty Bar combines the refreshing scent of cucumber and green tea with our gentlest cleansers and formula with ¼ moisturizing cream so you can enjoy the look and feel of softer, smoother and more radiant-looking skin vs. ordinary soap.

Moisturizing Beauty Bar Unlike ordinary soap that dries your skin, Dove delivers a rich mix of gentle, nourishing ingredients for hydrated, healthy-looking skin. Trusted by Dermatologists This Beauty Bar with gentle cleansers helps your skin retain its natural moisture, leaving it feeling silky smooth and soft. Have you tried them all? There's a Dove Beauty Bar for everyone and every occasion. Try them all and tell us which one's your favorite. Real Beauty is Cruelty-Free Dove is proud to be certified cruelty-free by PETA - globally, Dove does not test on animals.

Dove Advanced Care Dry Spray Antiperspirant Deodorant for Women 3.8 oz Dove Instant Foaming Body Wash 13.5 oz Dove Nourishing Secrets Conditioner Cool Moisture 12 oz With a caring formula that dries instantly, this dry spray antiperspirant will keep you protected for up to 48 hours With a revitalizing cucumber and green tea scent, this lightweight foam body wash envelops your skin in nourishment. This Dove conditioner nourishes dry hair while leaving it beautifully scented with a cucumber and green tea fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Dove Skin Care Beauty Bar in Cucumber and Green Tea is my absolute favorite, and I can’t say enough good things about it. This pack of 8 bars is not just a beauty bar; it’s a refreshing treat for my skin.The scent of cucumber and green tea is simply divine. It’s not overpowering but leaves a subtle, clean, and fresh fragrance on my skin that I adore. Every shower with this bar feels like a spa-like experience.What I appreciate the most is how gentle it is on the skin. Unlike regular bar soaps that can leave your skin feeling dry and tight, Dove’s beauty bar is incredibly moisturizing. It doesn’t strip away natural oils and leaves my skin feeling soft and supple after each use.The 3.75 oz bars last quite a while, making this pack a great value for the quality and benefits it provides. It’s become a staple in my daily skincare routine, and I wouldn’t want to be without it.In summary, the Dove Skin Care Beauty Bar in Cucumber and Green Tea is a true gem. It combines my favorite scent with gentle, moisturizing properties, leaving my skin feeling pampered and refreshed. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a soap that cares for their skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels clean & so smooth!!!🧼
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this Dove cool moisture cucumber beauty bar! I used to use Olay, and I still like those too, but I felt like changing thing's up and had heard good things about Dove. We started with the White bars, and then the pink coconut milk bars, and really liked both of them, so I thought why not try even more. Well...I'm so glad I did because I think this one is my favorite! I love how fresh and cool it smells and feels. I think they all work the same, but this green bar's fragrance just really makes me feel extra clean and fresh, which I think is what most of us are looking for after a shower. I like the shape of the bar too, because it fits perfectly in your palm while washing and doesn't slip away easily when going over an uneven body part. I will say that this fragrance is a little stronger than the white bars, and a little more than the pink coconut bars, so for those who are sensitive to fragrances or are looking for a fragrance free bar for any reason, I would recommend the white bar over this green, and probably over the pink, as well. The white has the least fragrance of the 3 in my opinion, although it does still have a fresh smell. I personally am not sensitive to fragrances, so maybe that's why I was so excited about this particular bar. I like it so much that I literally just purchased a 4 pack of the deodorant to match. Finger's crossed I like them since I went all out and got 4! Lol...These bars really feel great for your skin. My skin never feels tight and overly dry with these Dove bars like a lot of regular bar soaps do. I used to hate bar soaps growing up because of that feeling, and turned to body wash for years as an adult. After meeting my husband, and gaining weight and health problems after my second pregnancy and always feeling hot and sweaty, I didn't feel like body wash on a loofah was enough, at least not the small amount that used to suffice. He used bar soap, so I dredgingly gave it a try after swearing against it. Surprisingly I did feel cleaner, but again, I had that icky dry feeling. I researched and found Olay at the time, which is what I have been using since my daughter was born 9yrs ago. That is until about 9mnths ago when we first switched to Dove.These are called beauty bars because they're made mostly of moisturizers, rather than "soap." That's why your skin feels clean AND SOFT after washing. If you still feel like you need a "soap" to get fully clean, I recommend keeping one of these in the shower to use after scrubbing with the soap bar, because this will help to remoisturize your skin and prevent that icky dry and weird tight feeling when using only bar soap. That will help make these last even longer too, but of course will cost you to keep both on hand. Of course, those soap bars are usually cheaper, so it will even out some. Olay is honestly just as good, and is also considered a beauty bar, but unfortunately it's harder to find them in these bigger ounce bars, so we will probably stick to Dove for awhile. Dove bars do seem to get used up a little faster, but we're enjoying the change for now, especially if we can continue finding them at a good value on here using the subscribe and save. I recommend you giving Dove a try if you want to feel clean while still leaving your skin feeling smooth when you step out of the shower. My whole family of 4 really likes all 3 of the ones we've used, and it's usually hard to please everyone in my household. I hope my experience and my pictures help give you an idea of what to expect in person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic soap bar with a nice smell.
reviews.reviewText: I love the fragrance and the fact that your skin feels moisturized after using it. I’ve used Dove soap bars for ages. Price was competitive with other retailers. Can’t go wrong buying this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Using as a hand soap
reviews.reviewText: I don't use this as a body soap (but I'm sure I have previously in my life), so I won't rate it on how it cleanses and keeps the body from drying out. I do use it as a hand soap, and it has a nice scent, nice lather and seems to last quite a while. Does not dry out my hands like a lot of soaps do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: It's great for people with skin issues. Amazon wouldn't let me post what kind but my family member has delicate skin that's super sensitive. There's only so many types of soap they can use and this is one of them. I don't have to worry as much about rashes and dryness. It cuts down on the itching too. Scent is ok and bar soap lathers well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price & gentle on my skin
reviews.reviewText: Dove soaps have always been so gentle on my skin. And always smelled great. Especially cucumber scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A box full of clean
reviews.reviewText: I cut back on body wash purchasing…..it’s getting outrageously priced.Picked up a box of these bad boys and use them during work days and body wash during off days….this has saved me a bit of money.Pros:ValueScentCan be a defense item if you put one in a sockCons:You smell and feel better?Your wife has more money for Target after the body wash savings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove Soap Delivers
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely satisfied with my Dove soap purchase from this seller! The soap is gentle, moisturizing, and leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed. The transaction was smooth, shipping fast, and the product arrived in perfect condition. Highly recommend this seller for their quality products and excellent service. Five stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: Product does not match description Qty.
reviews.reviewText: The product says, 4 Bars but has only 3 Bars.Usually soaps come in packs of 4, with 3+1 offers. Looks like 1 bar from each pack has been removed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 29, 2012
reviews.reviewText: Yup, it's a pretty darn overpriced item, but I couldn't find it anywhere else. Maybe this is the only person in the country with soap? Anyhoo, it's Dove and it's soft and smells good. There is no alternative....except a cheaper one!
